metadata.Plot: Afer having been stood up at his own wedding, a young man vows that he will have nothing more to ever do with women. However, he soon discovers that he has been left a fortune--on condition that he gets married. Deciding that being rich and married would be preferable to being broke and single, he goes in search of a wife, but things don't turn out quite the way he planned.
metadata.Writer: Cecil B. DeMille, Keene Thompson, Walter Woods
metadata.Actors: Raymond Griffith, Vera Reynolds, Wallace Beery
